title: Joel Anderson on Omicron concerns, Slow Burn wrap, College Football Playoff
description:
Bomani Jones and Joel Anderson of Slate discuss their heightened concerns around the new "Omicron" variant of COVID-19 (1:45), the highlights of "Slow Burn" on the L.A. Riots now that Joel has wrapped Season 6 (22:41), as well as what can be learned from Alabama and Georgia progressing to the final of the College Football Playoff (35:29).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
